No recipes saved!

Press the "like" button to save recipes to your profile

resources.string:
Welcome to YumFood, the simplest solution for creating a tailored masterpiece every time you cook.


YumFood is to provide a stress-free cooking experience for whatever recipe you desire to create. By looking at the randomly generated recipes within a selected filter, YumFood users are not only given inspiration, but a push to also try new things. By creating this application our team envisions cooks to find recipes that can adhere to potential dietary restrictions all while producing yummy food.


We thank you for choosing YumFood as we believe this is the future of all recipe applications.



Sincerely, 
The YumFood Team, 
HCDD 440.
